text: Maytenus cymosa, also called Caribbean mayten, is a species of plant in the family Celastraceae. It is found in Puerto Rico, the British Virgin Islands, and the U.S. Virgin Islands. ==References== cymosa Category:Trees of the Caribbean Category:Flora of Puerto Rico Category:Flora of the British Virgin Islands Category:Flora of the United States Virgin Islands Category:Endangered flora of North America Category:Endangered flora of the United States Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Maytenus cymosa
